languages.text: {n}Кас раздосадованно вздыхает.{/n} "Похоже, плакала моя беззаботная жизнь. Аделия, доченька, собирай вещи — папочке надо хорошенько надраться".
{n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."
languages.original_text: {n}Кас раздосадованно вздыхает.{/n} "Похоже, плакала моя беззаботная жизнь. Аделия, доченька, собирай вещи — папочке надо хорошенько надраться".

{n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

languages.text: {n}卡斯沮丧地叹了口气。{/n}“看来，无忧无虑的生活要结束了。阿德莉雅，准备收拾东西吧，你爸爸打算好好喝上两杯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡斯沮丧地叹了口气。{/n}“看来，无忧无虑的生活要结束了。阿德莉雅，准备收拾东西吧，你爸爸打算好好喝上两杯。”

languages.text: {n}Kas seufzt enttäuscht.{/n} "So viel zum sorgenfreien Leben. Adelia, holt Eure Sachen — Euer Vater braucht einen Drink. Oder fünf."
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas seufzt enttäuscht.{/n} "So viel zum sorgenfreien Leben. Adelia, holt Eure Sachen — Euer Vater braucht einen Drink. Oder fünf."

languages.text: {n}Kas pousse un soupir de frustration.{/n} « Bon, je peux tirer un trait sur ma vie à l'abri du besoin et de l'inquiétude... Adélia, prends tes affaires. Ton père a besoin d'un bon verre. Ou plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas pousse un soupir de frustration.{/n} « Bon, je peux tirer un trait sur ma vie à l'abri du besoin et de l'inquiétude... Adélia, prends tes affaires. Ton père a besoin d'un bon verre. Ou plus. »

languages.text: {n}Kas suelta un suspiro de frustración.{/n} «Pues nada, adiós a una vida libre de preocupaciones. Recoge tus cosas, Adelia, que papá necesita un buen trago. O cinco».
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas suelta un suspiro de frustración.{/n} «Pues nada, adiós a una vida libre de preocupaciones. Recoge tus cosas, Adelia, que papá necesita un buen trago. O cinco».

languages.text: {n}カスはイライラからため息を漏らした。{/n}「何不自由ない生活だな。アデリア、お前は荷物をまとめろ。パパは旨い酒を5杯ほど飲みたい気分だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}カスはイライラからため息を漏らした。{/n}「何不自由ない生活だな。アデリア、お前は荷物をまとめろ。パパは旨い酒を5杯ほど飲みたい気分だ」

languages.text: {n}Kas, hayal kırıklığıyla iç çekiyor.{/n} "Dertsiz tasasız hayat buraya kadarmış. Eşyalarını topla Adelia, babacığın birkaç şişenin dibine vuracak."
languages.original_text: {n}Kas lets out a sigh of frustration.{/n} "So much for a life without a care in the world. Adelia, get your things — your daddy needs a good drink or five."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kas, hayal kırıklığıyla iç çekiyor.{/n} "Dünyayı umursamadan geçen bir hayat böylece noktalandı. Eşyalarını topla Adelia, babanın birkaç bardak yuvarlamaya ihtiyacı var."
